alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 8:40PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ulster and central Dutchess Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 840 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Modena, or near New Paltz, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Poughkeepsie, New Paltz, Wallkill, Hyde Park, Plattekill, Pleasant Valley, Highland, Millbrook, Modena, Fairview, Red Oaks Mill, Dover Plains, Lloyd, Gardiner, Tuckers Corner, Salt Point, Forest Glen, Knapps Corner, Hoxie Corner and Elting Corners. This includes Interstate 87 near exit 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for east central New York.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess
